ygData.subject: Re: Get Megatron
ygData.msgSnippet: DarkMouse:: She turned to Demise. Yeah, sure. No sweat. Lead me to him. She walked out of the lab and followed Demise. ... crap, ... rather ... internal ...

DarkMouse::
She turned to Demise. "Yeah, sure. No sweat. Lead me to him." She 
walked out of the lab and followed Demise.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Back from testing! I nearly broke a leg and my elbow hurts like 
crap, 
> but I think I'm fine. I passed the test with flying colors (or 
rather 
> flying side-kicks), at least I think I did. The results have yet to 
> be finalized.
> 
> ::Killfest/Greven/EndBringer/Demise/Scyther::
> 
> Killfest nods. "EndBringer, come with me." He says over his 
internal 
> communication system with his team, "Greven, go to the bridge. 
> Scyther, go to the CR room. If no one is there, also go to the 
> bridge. Demise, guard Darkmouse, she's too valuable to lose. 
Violence 
> will soon break out, I think you all know how to deal with it."
> 
> His team nods and walks out toward the specified positions. 
Killfest 
> opens a comm to DrillBit. "I will meet you in my quarters, room 
1468."
> 
> He turns a corner, walking to his quarters with EndBringer 
following 
> him. "Darkmouse," he says into his comm, "Report to my quarters as 
> soon as you can."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Demise walks to the lab, entering and looking at 
Darkmouse. "Killfest 
> has asigned me to guard you in case the enemy tries to make any 
> moves," he says in a raspy voice, one that barely qualified as a 
> voice in the first place.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Greven sets off toward the bridge.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Still cloaked and invisible to all sensors, Scyther walks into the 
CR 
> room, looking around.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::DrillBit::
> > 
> > DrillBit walked out of the room, so Megatron couldn't here him.
> > "Killfest, get to a secure place. We have to talk privatly."
> > 
> > OOC: Good luck Yanshosh. Jeesh black belt. I only made it to a 2nd
> > degree blue belt in Karate. Then I quit.
